articles.author: Lori Teresa Yearwood
articles.title: Many minorities avoid seeking credit due to generations of discrimination. Why that keeps them back
articles.description: Decades of discrimination by the federal government and America's financial institutions has induced an almost trauma-like response in many people of color, particularly African Americans, making them less likely to seek credit.
articles.content:
